com.guidewire.ab.plugin.addressbook

Interface IAddressBookAdapter

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IPlugin
    Deprecated. 
    External entities are deprecated. Please use the new Java API instead.

    @Deprecated
public interface IAddressBookAdapter
extends IPlugin
    Guidewire application interface to an Address Book. This plugin has been deprecated.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  IAddressBookAdapter.UTIL
      Deprecated. 
      Utility class for accessing static features for com.guidewire.ab.plugin.addressbook.IAddressBookAdapter Access static properties for this type.

      • findDefinitiveMatch

        ContactFindMatchResult findDefinitiveMatch(Contact contactData)
                                           throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Deprecated. Since ClaimCenter 8.0 Use findDuplicates() in ContactSystemPlugin.
        Searches for a contact that definitively matches the given contact data.
        Parameters:
        contactData -
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • findPotentialMatches

        ContactSearchResult findPotentialMatches(Contact contactData,
                                       gw.plugin.addressbook.AddressBookRemotableSearchResultSpec searchResultSpec)
                                         throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Deprecated. Since ClaimCenter 8.0 Use findDuplicates() in ContactSystemPlugin
        Searches for all contacts that potentially match the given contact data. Results are specified by the given SearchResultSpec.
        Parameters:
        contactData -
        searchResultSpec -
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • retrieveContact

        Contact retrieveContact(java.lang.String addressBookUId,
                      ContactRelationshipSpec contactRelationshipSpec)
                        throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Deprecated. Since ClaimCenter 8.0 Use retrieveContact() in ContactSystemPlugin
        Looks up the contact with the given Address Book ID. Specifies relationships to include with the given ContactRelationshipSpec.
        Parameters:
        addressBookUId -
        contactRelationshipSpec -
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • retrieveRelatedContacts

        Contact retrieveRelatedContacts(Contact contact,
                              ContactRelationshipSpec contactRelationshipSpec)
                                throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Deprecated. Since ClaimCenter 8.0 Use retrieveRelatedContacts() in ContactSystemPlugin
        Retrieves related contacts for a given Contact, for example if the Contact had originally been retrieved with a restrictive ContactRelationshipSpec. Specifies relationships to include with the given ContactRelationshipSpec.
        Parameters:
        contact - a contact retrieved from an addressbook search. This contact will populated with all related contacts retrieved from the addressbook.
        contactRelationshipSpec -
        Returns:
        the modified contact. This must be the same as the Contact provided.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • searchContact

        ContactSearchResult searchContact(ContactSearchCriteria searchCriteria,
                                gw.plugin.addressbook.AddressBookRemotableSearchResultSpec searchResultSpec)
                                  throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Deprecated. Since ClaimCenter 8.0 Use searchContacts() in ContactSystemPlugin
        Searches for all contacts that match the given search criteria. Results are specified by the given SearchResultSpec.
        Parameters:
        searchCriteria -
        searchResultSpec -
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • submitUpdates

        ContactUpdateResult submitUpdates(UpdateBatch updates,
                                Contact contact)
                                  throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Deprecated. Since ClaimCenter 8.0 Use updateContact() in ContactSystemPlugin
        Updates (or creates if not already exists) AddressBook Contacts as specified in the UpdateBatch parameter.
        Parameters:
        updates - the set of update operations to be performed in the address book
        contact - the Contact being updated or created
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
